plot: Playing the defendant in an expressionistic fantasy version of a courtroom, Ethel Merman pleads her case (singing "My Future Just Passed") and promises to stay out of trouble from now on ("Sing, You Sinners").
title: Her Future
plot_es: Playing the defendant in an expressionistic fantasy version of a courtroom, Ethel Merman pleads her case (singing "My Future Just Passed") and promises to stay out of trouble from now on ("Sing, You Sinners").
plot_en: Playing the defendant in an expressionistic fantasy version of a courtroom, Ethel Merman pleads her case (singing "My Future Just Passed") and promises to stay out of trouble from now on ("Sing, You Sinners").
